trans-unit.target: Parallel Lives

trans-unit.target: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

trans-unit.target: Whenever an opponent draws a card, that player may pay {2}. If the player doesn't, you create a Treasure token. (It's an artifact with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

trans-unit.target: Training Grounds

trans-unit.resname: P22·6 | Training Grounds | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: P22·7 | Animate Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Animate Dead
trans-unit.target: Animate Dead

trans-unit.resname: P22·7 | Animate Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature card in a graveyard
trans-unit.target: Enchant creature card in a graveyard

trans-unit.resname: P22·7 | Animate Dead | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with CARDNAME." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach CARDNAME to it. When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.
trans-unit.target: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it loses "enchant creature card in a graveyard" and gains "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with CARDNAME." Return enchanted creature card to the battlefield under your control and attach CARDNAME to it. When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.

trans-unit.target: Enchanted creature gets -1/-0.
